transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hanji.
Executive: Hello. Hi, good afternoon sir. Tanya baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se.
Customer: Hanji Tanya ji.
Executive: Hmm. Sir aapka yaha pe ek mujhe bhi concern raise mila tha call back ke liye. Kya issue aa raha hai sir?
Customer: Video meet ke liye.
Executive: Sorry?
Customer: Aap hamare account manager hai Tanya ji. Yes, yes sir, yes sir.
Customer: Hanji to aapne bataya nahi boliye agar aapne Shriya ji account manager the change ho gaye pehle Shriya ji se Asad ji ho gaye Asad ji se Tanya ji ho gaye aapko batana chahiye tha.
Executive: Nahi nahi sir actually na Shreya mam ka bhi promotion ho gaya wo meri manager ho gayi hai. To main unke under hi hu. Ji.
Customer: Ha mujhe bataye lekin Shriya ji bhi call nahi utha rahe maine kara tha unko.
Executive: Nahi sir abhi na jab aapka ye concern raise hua maine iske pehle bhi aapko abhi try kiya tha call karne ka sir. But na answer nahi hui call. To maine wapas abhi kiya hai. Bataye sir.
Customer: Ye aapka hi number hai?
Executive: Yes sir ye mera number hai.
Customer: Ispe main back call kar sakta hu?
Executive: Ha kar sakte hai. Aap mera number hi save kar lijiye. Sorry. Bataye IndianMART help karke likh ke aa raha hai iske piche.
Customer: Ha sir aap na mera number save kar lijiye Tanya ke name se. To aapko kuch bhi concern hai kuch bhi query hai na to aap directly mujhe call kariyega sir.
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Tanya ji main aap se yahi janna chah raha hu abhi mera jo portal hai uska aap kya status chal raha hai kitna ranking kar raha hai kya kya kar raha hai kuch batayenge mujhe?
Executive: Okay sir. Kyunki by leads aur inquiries to mere pass abhi itna aa nahi raha hai. To main wahi janna chah raha hu kya dikkat aa raha hai.
Customer: Achcha. Sir agar main by leads ki baat karu to abhi 16 days mein aapne 53 by leads consume kari hai.
Customer: Hmm. Thik hai? Aapne kitni consume kari hai?
Executive: Ha sure. Done.
Customer: Abhi abhi kar le sir video meet pe jaane?
Customer: Ji. Bilkul. Hello.
Executive: Uh abhi sir 4 baje meri ek meeting hai to hum 4 baje ke baad kare abhi hum call pe main aapko sari cheeze bata de rahi hu fir video meet pe screen share karke sari cheeze dikha bhi dungi.
Customer: Ha mujhe pehle ye bataye mera ranking kya dikha raha hai?
Executive: Dikha de rahi hu. Sir aapka jo catalog ka score hai wo 78.9% hai then agar main aapki ranking ki baat karu to aap hamare four by four customer ho like highly active customer ho sir aap hamare.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Thik hai? Fir agar main aapki by leads ki baat karu.
Executive: Ha to abhi November mein sir aapne 16 days mein 53 by leads consume kari hai aur agar October ki baat. Maine ye bola ki aap mujhe ye bataye ki mera ranking kitne number pe kara raha hai mera Neha glass.
Executive: Achcha ranking. Ek second sir rukiye.
Executive: Firozabad right?
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: All India pe dekhiyega.
Executive: Ha ha. Batao sir.
Executive: Ha sir aap matlab pehle page mein hi aa rahe hai.
Customer: Konse number pe?
Executive: 13th number mein aa rahe hai sir aap.
Customer: 13 number pe. Ji. To pehla page nahi dikha raha wo. Bahut jyada upar? Hmm 13 number kafi jyada matlab niche se bahut jyada upar nahi dikha raha 13 number?
Executive: Matlab aap kahan pe the?
Customer: Top 10 mein the.
Executive: Ha to sir aap abhi bhi front page mein hi aa rahe hai. Aisa nahi hai ki aapki kuch visibility kam ho gayi hai aap hai abhi wahi par hi.
Customer: Abhi bhi aap sir. Mere se aage kon hai?
Executive: Aapse aage kon? Hmm hmm. Main aapko Firozabad ka batau sir ya fir aap pura puch rahe ho? All India ka all India ka Firozabad ka mat bataye all India ka.
Customer: Sir aapse upar to ye Fresh marks ek exports and A&D resources Sushil Kumar ye sare aise dikh rahe hai.
Customer: Hmm. Aap mujhe dikhaiye iska yaha pe mujhe share kijiye kuch iska zara sa.
Executive: To sir ye bataye aap 4 baje. Hai kyunki mere pass abhi jo inquiries hai wo bahut kam aa gayi hai pehle ke according kyunki mere pass abhi Diwali October ho ke chuka Diwali. Thik hai na? Diwali. Nahi nahi sir suniye suniye main aapko bata rahi hu. Jo ye aapke pass inquiries kam ho gayi hai aana aap ye jo bol rahe hai aur jo by leads aap bol rahe hai na sir iska main jo hota hai ye kaise badhti hai ya ghatti hai wo main aapko bata deti hu. Wo depend karta hai sir hum apna system kaise use kar rahe hai hum jitna jyada use karenge daily agar aap active rahenge sir jitni aap by leads wagera consume karenge thik hai? Waise hamare calls ka flow bhi badhta hai aur main dekh rahi hu aapko calls bhi achche amount mein receive ho rahe hai 18 calls abhi November mein receive hue hai aur eight calls miss hue hai. Then October mein bhi aapne 35 calls receive kare 15 calls miss kare. So it's like decent amount you are getting. Sorry? 35 call aap bata rahe ho.
Executive: Ji. October mein.
Customer: October November mein?
Executive: November mein sir 18 calls aur aapne receive kare hai aur eight calls miss hue hai.
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: Ha. To abhi ye bataye sir hum ek bar video meet pe fir kitne baje connect kar le?
Customer: Aap aap kitne baje free hai?
Executive: Sir 4:30 connect kar le main aapko dikha dungi ki aap kahan abhi stand kar rahe hai kitni calls wagera receive ho rahi hai. Kitni by leads aap consume kar rahe hai main sari cheeze aapko video meet pe dikha dungi.
Customer: Lead manager mein aap mujhe ye bataye ki abhi tak mere pass kitna inquiry receive hua hai?
Executive: Inquiries bhi bata de rahi hu. Sir agar November ki baat karu to 79.
Customer: 79. Kafi jyada kam nahi hai ye dekhte hue waise hamara do saal ka package hai TrustSeal ka lekin hamara ye bahut jyada kam hota ja raha hai din pe din ki business bahut jyada kam nikal raha hai aur plus cheez ye hai ki aapka jo buyer hai jo bhi amongst se purchase kar raha hai wo matlab itne quality wale nahi hai ki ek bar mein deal close ho jaye. Samajh lijiye aap thik hai nahi thik hai. Kyunki wo jyadatar kya karte hai inquiry karte hai pata karte hai ki baat chit karte hai thik hai sir ho gaya batayenge ye wo aur jyadatar to call hi nahi uthate main aapko batau. Ye bhi ek masla hai.
Executive: Calls nahi utha rahe aap?
Customer: Hanji aur aapka jo inquiry aur jo by leads aap mujhe de rahe ho wo by leads jo hai quality wala by leads nahi hai matlab jaise ki mera package hai aapka do saal ka TrustSeal ka. Thik hai na? To us hisab se mere pass by leads jo aana chahiye wo aana chahiye bulk quantity mein ki aapka un quantity mein by leads aana chahiye lekin by leads aata hai 50 piece ka 100 piece ka 10 piece ka. To sir jaisi by leads aap consume. Ek by leads ki kimat hai aap kya 600 ki including tax. Thik hai na? 600 kuch rupay ki by leads fix karti hai. To ek by leads agar aap main 10 30 ka uthata hu to wo to mera waste ho gaya aur wo bane bhi nahi bane kya fayda aur main agar 100 piece ka bhi uthata hu to wo to ek by leads jati hai saat logo ke pass. Saat log ek by leads consume kar sakte hai.
Executive: Nahi seven logo ke pass nahi jati hai sir char se panch logo ke pass jati hai aur usme se jo pehle consume kar lete hai yes aur sir by lead jo abhi aapke pass aati hai na wo hamare consumption behavior par hoti hai hum jaisi by leads consume karte hai to sir humko waisi by leads bhejta hai. Agar aapko bulk wali chahiye to aap jyada se jyada bulk wala filter ka use kariye sir.
Customer: Bulk wala hum filter ka use bhi kar lete hai chaliye aapki baat man lete hai aap video meet pe kab aa rahe hai aap mujhe ye bataye iske baad karte hai. Ha to 4:30 pe kar lete hai sir.
Customer: Thik hai 4:30 pe. 4:30 pe aapka yahi number hai na?
Executive: Yes sir aap ye mera number save kar lijiye. Aap aap agar aap mere manager ho to aap mujhe apna personal number dijiye kyunki IndiaMART pe aap ho sakta hai call na uthao jyadatar.
Customer: Sir ye mera hi number hai aapko dekhiye na 9369 karke number aa raha hai.
Customer: Ek minute ek minute ek minute. 9 nahi ye aa raha hai mere pass 898048163054.
Executive: Ye kya number hai?
Executive: Ye aapko kya aa raha hai number batayega zara fir se ek bar? 80 hmm 48 hmm 16 hmm 30 hmm 54. Okay. Sir abhi main jo aapse baat kar rahi hu na ye mere personal number pe main baat kar rahi hu. Mera personal number aap likh lijiye 9369.
Customer: Ek minute. 9639. Nahi 9369.
Customer: 9369 166 166 172 172. Dekhiye main aapko batau abhi abhi ek month ke andar do teen manager change ho chuke hai to main aap se yahi confirm karna chahta hu kitne time tak aap manager hai hamare. Nahi nahi sir ab main hi aapki manager hu actually na abhi Shreya mam ka abhi promotion hua hai sir. Wo abhi meri manager bani hai. Yes yes to abhi aapke account manager main hi hu. Sorry. Bataya tha unhone promotion ho gaya manager bahut badhiya baat hai karta hu. Kyunki do saal se hamara do saal se wahi manage kar rahe the. Thik hai na? To unse kafi achcha bond. Abhi bhi aap ha abhi bhi sir unhi ke under hi aapka account hai main unke under hi hu wo meri manager hai. Okay okay. Yes yes yes. To ye aapka number hai Tanya ji to main aapka iska ye save kar lunga okay. To aap mujhe ye bataye aap ye aapka jo weekend vacant team hai usse thoda ispe kam kare kyunki portal jo hai wo kafi niche jata hua dikh raha hai mujhe jahan tak dikh raha hai. Nahi nahi sir aap pareshan nahi huiye suniye aap abhi to sir meri meeting hai na thik hai? To abhi aap ye mera number save kar lo. Thik hai? Kuch bhi issue aa raha hai kuch bhi problem aa raha hai aap mujhe connect kar lo baki ye number aapka ho jayega. Sir Saturday Sunday hamara off hota hai sir Saturday Sunday. Mujhe pata mujhe pata hai tabhi to main puch raha hu aap se. Nahi nahi Saturday Sunday nahi kuch urgent hai to aap mujhe text kar sakte hai sir. Saturday Sunday mein aap nahi uthayenge right? Hmm. But Shriya ji ko uth gaya tha sir chaliye koi baat nahi aap nahi uthayenge sir. Nahi sir uthane wali baat nahi hai but sir kuch urgent hai na to aap mujhe message kar do call kar lo sir. Ab hum bhi sir like Monday to Friday pura working ke baad sir do din ka chutti milta hai. But aisa nahi hai sir ki hum aapki kabhi bhi help nahi karenge ki Saturday Sunday hum uthayenge hi nahi bilkul aisa kuch nahi hai sir. Bahut urgent hai aap mujhe call kariye main hamesha answerable hu. Main aapki call uthaungi. Thik hai? Baki aap number save kar lo aur 4:30 hum connect karte hai sir. Okay Tanya ji. Okay okay sir okay thank you. Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to know portal status and ranking.

- Inquiries and buyleads are not sufficient.

- ByLeads are not of good quality.



Resolution:

- Informed about catalog score and ranking.

- Informed about byleads consumption.

- Explained how to increase inquiries and buyleads.



Next Steps: 

- Will connect on video meet at 4:30 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- ranking, buyleads, inquiries, account manager
